fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot at a player; dealing a basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Plasma Accelerator**
*Unlock Condition*: Have a person live your attack due to factors other than defense.
- The target now gets dealt two basic attacks in a row, and your attack will always succeed.
- After killing one person whom you couldn't without this upgrade, you may attack two people in a night.
- After killing 7 people, you will now attack all the visitors of whoever you attack as well.
**Rocket Storm!**
*Unlock Condition:* Visit a player with basic defense.
- You will now deal two powerful attacks to your target.
- After attacking a player with powerful or higher defense, you will now deal unstoppable attack.
- After killing a player with powerful defense, you will now attack your targets neighbors as well.
- After killing a player with powerful defense, your attack is upgraded to unstoppable.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- You may only choose one upgrade path outlined in bold.
